name: data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool indonesian_national_identity_card_validator.
Tool description: Indonesian NIC Validator & Detail Finder API
API description: Fetches details of an Indonesian national identity card such as day, month, year, gender, and location using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The Indonesian national identity card number to validate and fetch details for.
